Learn more about Donuts
General Questions
What are donuts?
Donuts are tokens running on the Ethereum main-net that represent community contribution & engagement here at r/ethtrader. Donuts follow the ERC-20 standard and are the first ever implementation of Reddit Community Points. An easy way to think of them is a spendable and tradeable Karma, but exclusive to this subreddit.
What are donuts?
